video.title: Fate/Zero
video.synopsis: After three unsettled battles for the mystical Holy Grail, an artifact that grants a miracle to those who hold it, a fourth war begins.

episodes.synopsis: War looms as seven chosen mages from around the world are summoned to battle one another for control of the miracle-granting Holy Grail.
episodes.title: The Summoning of Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Saber observes Irisviel and Kiritsugu, a killer meets a kindred spirit, and the final mage arrives in Fuyuki City, the setting of the Holy Grail War.
episodes.title: The Fake First Shot

episodes.synopsis: There is relief among the mages with Assassin out of the picture. While Iri and Saber are out touring Fuyuki City, they are challenged to a duel.
episodes.title: Fuyuki City

episodes.synopsis: Saber and Lancer battle as the others are drawn to watching the two skillful epic heroes attack each other. There is an interruption, however.
episodes.title: Spearhead

episodes.synopsis: What began as a duel between Lancer and Saber becomes an all-out melee as several of the fighters' Noble Phantasms are revealed in combat.
episodes.title: A Wicked Beast's Roar

episodes.synopsis: It’s a case of mistaken identity when Caster addresses Saber as "Jeanne." When Saber denies the possibility, Caster insists she’s lost her memory.
episodes.title: A Night of Schemes

episodes.synopsis: The battle is on hold as the group decides what to do about Ryunosuke Uryu and his servant, Caster, who have been kidnapping and sacrificing children.
episodes.title: Dark Forest

episodes.synopsis: As Saber and Lancer fight wave after wave of Caster's demonic minions, a powerful enemy confronts Iri as she flees the castle with Maiya.
episodes.title: The Mage-Slayer

episodes.synopsis: Lancer finds Kayneth in a dire situation. Meanwhile, Kiritsugu ignores Saber's advice about Caster, instead setting out to finish off Kayneth.
episodes.title: Master and Servant

episodes.synopsis: As children continue to disappear from Fuyuki City, young Rin, Tokiomi’s daughter, tries to locate her best friend, who isn’t responding to her calls.
episodes.title: Rin's Big Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Saber’s suspicions rise when Rider arrives at Einzbern Castle to have a nonviolent conversation with her about her kingship.
episodes.title: Discussing the Grail

episodes.synopsis: Kiritsugu is reviewing his rivals' whereabouts. While Iri and Saber relocate to a new base, Saber notices that Iri is behaving oddly.
episodes.title: The Grail Beckons

episodes.synopsis: Caster and Uryu discuss their views on God, resulting in plans for a horrifying attack -- one that requires everyone else to unite against Caster.
episodes.title: The Forbidden Feast

episodes.synopsis: The heroic spirits Saber, Lancer and Rider fight side-by-side against Caster’s demon beast, but it keeps regenerating at a staggering pace.
episodes.title: The Mion River Battle

episodes.synopsis: Saber and Rider rethink their strategy in attacking Caster, forcing Lancer to make a difficult choice. Kariya, meanwhile, fights Tokiomi.
episodes.title: Golden Shine

episodes.synopsis: With all the Heroes exhausted from their win against Caster, a battle is fought with honor and respect between two Knights.
episodes.title: The End of Honor

episodes.synopsis: As fighters are knocked out of contention, Saber receives an invitation to form an alliance and Iri confesses a secret to Maiya.
episodes.title: The Eighth Contract

episodes.synopsis: On an island in the Philippines, young Kiritsugu uncovers the horrible truth about his father’s laboratory experiments.
episodes.title: Distant Memories

episodes.synopsis: Young Kiritsugu trains with the mercenary Natalia, traveling the world as the assassin and her apprentice take on various assignments.
episodes.title: Where Justice Is Found

episodes.synopsis: Iri begins to weaken as the war builds to a climax. Upon learning that Saber and Rider are preparing to battle, Kiritsugu sets out to kill Tokiomi.
episodes.title: Return of the Assassin

episodes.synopsis: Saber and Kiritsugu try to track down Iri's kidnapper. A tragedy unfolds at the church, where Kariya intends to face Tokiomi.
episodes.title: Knight on Two Wheels

episodes.synopsis: Kirei interrogates Iri about Kiritsugu, while Waver decides to give his power to Rider, who is being summoned for a duel with Archer.
episodes.title: All the Evil in the World

episodes.synopsis: As the teams race to the battlefield, Berserker reveals his identity to Saber, and Rider and Waver are intercepted before they can reach the theater.
episodes.title: The Sea at the End of the World

episodes.synopsis: Kiritsugu discovers an unexpected aspect of the Grail, which forces him to reconsider his motives. Kiritsugu finally confronts Kirei.
episodes.title: The Last Command Seal

episodes.synopsis: As Kiritsugu demands for the Grail’s destruction, the Grail inflicts more damage in its elimination and unexpectedly reawakens a familiar face.
episodes.title: Fate/Zero
